note.previous: Rūpena te sadisī natthi, devesu gandhabbamanussaloke
Mā taṃ sabbo jano pacchā, pakuṭṭhāyi

note.original: gathito (sī. pī.), giddhito (syā. ka.), giddhiko (ka. aṭṭha.)

note.previous: Yaṃ pitvā uṭṭhāya pavedhamāno, sīsañca bāhuñca
Yaṃ ve pivitvā ukkaṭṭho āvilakkho, mameva sabbā pathavīti maññe

note.original: yaṃ ve pitvā pattakkhandhā, sayanti gāvo kūṭahatāriva; na hi vāruṇiyā vego, narena sussahoriva; (sī.)

alternatives.alternative: yaṃ ve pitvā pattakkhandhā, sayanti gāvo kūṭahatāriva; na hi vāruṇiyā vego, narena sussahoriva;

note.original: yaṃ ve pitvā pattakkhandhā, sayanti gāvo kūṭahatāriva; na hi vāruṇiyā vego, narena sussahoriva; (sī.)

alternatives.alternative: yaṃ ve pitvā pattakkhandhā, sayanti gāvo kūṭahatāriva; na hi vāruṇiyā vego, narena sussahoriva;

note.previous: Yaṃ manussā vivajjenti, sappaṃ ghoravisaṃ miva
Yaṃ ve pitvā andhakaveṇḍaputtā, samuddatīre paricārayantā
ca te māhu raṭṭhe, gacchāmahaṃ porisādassa ñatte
Kiṃ kamma kubbaṃ tava deva pāva
te pāṇamahaṃ nimissaṃ, tasmā mataṃ jīvitassa vaṇṇemi
have dhitimā rājaputto, vanditvā mātu ca pitu ca
Etena saccena sarantu devā, anuññāto sotthi paccehi bhātika
Cando yathā rāhumukhā pamutto, virocate pannaraseva bhāṇumā
Evaṃ tuvaṃ porisādā pamutto, viroca kapile
Tato have dhitimā rājaputto, katañjalī pariyāya
Atha dakkhasī meghasamānavaṇṇaṃ, nigrodharājaṃ atha sahassapādaṃ
Katthacchatī katthamupeti ṭhānaṃ, vīthissa kā nhāna
Viddho ca nāgo koñcamanādi ghoraṃ, sabbe ca
Taṃ addasā sā ca mamaṃ asaṃsi, dantehi atthoti ca maṃ
hi me dantayugā uḷārā, ye me pitūnañca
Taṃ tvaṃ atthañca dhammañca, bhadrakāra pabrūhi
Kummaggaṃ na niveseyya, yathā mūḷho acetaso
Hatthapādā ca te setā, tato setataraṃ
Yasmā ca vāri gambhīraṃ, tasmā na samapajjisaṃ
Te maṃ pamattaṃ hiṃseyyuṃ, te tvaṃ disvā nivāraya

note.original: yo mittānaṃ idhaddubhi (sī. aṭṭha.), yo mittānaṃ idha dubbhati (pī.)
note.previous: Kuṭṭhī kilāsī bhavati, yo mittānidha dubbhati
Bhayaṃ tamanveti sayaṃ abodhaṃ, nāgaṃ yathā paṇḍarakaṃ supaṇṇo
Yo guyhamantaṃ parirakkhaneyyaṃ, mohā naro saṃsati hāsamāno
Āsīviso dummukhotyāhu taṃ naraṃ, ārā ārā
Ārā amittā byavajanti tehi, āsīvisā vā riva sattusaṅghā
nu kho vivariṃ guyhamatthaṃ, atthā ca dhammā ca apaggatamhā
Tasmā hi mittānaṃ na dubbhitabbaṃ, mittadubbhā
vedhamānā girikandarāyaṃ, ekā tuvaṃ tiṭṭhasi saṃhitūru
Yadā harāmi taṃ bhakkho, tassa nūnajja nādhati
Na te puttā bhavissanti, na hiraññaṃ na dhāniyaṃ
Ñātimittā suhajjā ca, na taṃ maññanti māniyaṃ
Tattha disvā ca sutvā ca, tato taṃ
Kiṃ tattha brahmadattassa, yaṃ taṃ maggeyya
Yo tvaṃ sapasi rājānaṃ, aparajjhitvāna attano
Evaṃ haññatu pañcālo, saṅgāme asinā hato
Yaṃ pasu khīraṃ chaḍḍeti, pasupālaṃ vihiṃsati
Kiṃ tattha brahmadattassa, yaṃ no garahate
imaṃ brahme surajjakaṃ siyā, phītaṃ raṭṭhaṃ muditaṃ
